item.title: Brent add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "It is only shallow people who do not judge by appearances. The true mystery of the world is the visible, not the invisible...." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Brent add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "A foolish consistency is the hobgoblin of little minds." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Brent add a quote by W.B. Yeats
item.description: "And I will find some peace there, for peace comes dropping slow,/ Dropping from the veils of the morning to where the cricket sings..." -- W.B. Yeats

item.title: Brent add a quote by W.H. Auden
item.description: "The glacier knocks in the cupboard, The desert sighs in the bed, And the crack in the teacup opens A lane to the land of the dead." -- W.H. Auden

item.title: Brent add a quote by Hank Williams
item.description: "I ain't gonna worry wrinkles in my brow, cuz nothin's never gonna be alright nohow. No matter how I struggle and strive, I'll never get out of this world alive." -- Hank Williams

item.title: Brent add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "Upon four-legged forest clouds the cowboy angel rides" -- Bob Dylan

item.title: Brent add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "He not busy being born is busy dying." -- Bob Dylan

item.title: Brent add a quote by Stephen Malkmus
item.description: "We got smashed on Eos, underneath a Doric arch. And a trashed blonde scandy mistook me for a Swede. Her slurred medeival accent was like a puddle at my feet. You could see chopped tobacco in her teeth. " -- Stephen Malkmus

item.title: Brent add a quote by Ezra Pound
item.description: "All things are a-flowing,' sage Heraclitus says, but a tawdry cheapness shall outlast all days." -- Ezra Pound

item.title: Brent add a quote by Joe Pernice
item.description: "Contemplating suicide-- or a graduate degree" -- Joe Pernice

item.title: Brent add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "One's not half of two; two are halves of one." -- E.E. Cummings
